com.wit.android.widget.adapter.widget

Class StateLinearLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • LinearLayout
      • com.wit.android.widget.SelectableLinearLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IStateView

    public class StateLinearLayout
extends LinearLayout
implements IStateView

    Class Overview

    Updated LinearLayout to handle custom management of the states in the list view (especially when the ListView or GridView should provide multiple selection mode).

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    LinearLayout, IStateView

      • setHandleDefaultStates

        public void setHandleDefaultStates(boolean handle)
        Description copied from interface: IStateView

        Sets the boolean flag to indicate if the view should handle default states.

        Specified by:
        setHandleDefaultStates in interface IStateView
        Parameters:
        handle - If set to true the view will handle default setting of the states otherwise states of this view can be handled only using by overriding methods.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
